SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc12
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.Model.Server

Class ServerModel

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.Model.Server.ServerModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Listenable
public class ServerModel extends Object implements Listenable
Represents the server-side model responsible for managing game and lobby controllers. This class provides methods to create, access, and destroy controllers for lobbies and games. It also maintains lists of listeners for lobby updates and ensures thread-safe operations for adding, removing, and notifying these listeners.

The ServerModel class encapsulates functionality related to server-side game and lobby management. It statically loads and maintains the lists of cards used in the game and provides methods to interact with lobby and game controllers.

The class also implements the Listenable interface to allow for registering, removing, and notifying listeners about operations made on the lobbies. Additionally, it ensures thread safety when manipulating lists of listeners.

  • Field Details

    • CARDS_LIST

      public static final Map<Integer,Card> CARDS_LIST
      The map of cards used to perform server-side operations in the game. Each card is mapped to its unique ID for easy access.

    • CLIENTS_CARDS_LIST

      public static final Map<Integer,ClientCard> CLIENTS_CARDS_LIST
      The map of cards used to graphically represent them on the clients. Each client card is mapped to its unique ID for easy access.

    • LOBBY_CONTROLLERS_LOCK

      public final ReentrantReadWriteLock LOBBY_CONTROLLERS_LOCK
      The lock used to ensure thread safety for lobby controllers.

    • GAME_CONTROLLERS_LOCK

      public final ReentrantReadWriteLock GAME_CONTROLLERS_LOCK
      The lock used to ensure thread safety for game controllers.

    • LOBBIES_LISTENERS

      public final CopyOnWriteArrayList<Listener> LOBBIES_LISTENERS
      The list of listeners for lobby updates. This list allows thread-safe addition and removal of listeners.

  • Constructor Details

    • ServerModel

      public ServerModel()
      Constructs a new instance of ServerModel. Initializes the lobby and game controllers maps and the list of lobby listeners.

  • Method Details

    • getLobbyController

      public LobbyController getLobbyController(UUID lobbyUUID)
      Retrieves the lobby controller associated with the specified lobby UUID.
      Parameters:
      lobbyUUID - The UUID of the lobby.
      Returns:
      The lobby controller associated with the specified UUID, or null if not found.

    • getLobbiesMap

      public Map<UUID,Lobby> getLobbiesMap()
      Retrieves the map of lobby UUIDs to their corresponding lobbies.
      Returns:
      A map of lobby UUIDs to lobbies.

    • createLobbyController

      public LobbyController createLobbyController(Lobby lobby)
      Creates a new lobby controller for the specified lobby. This method notifies all registered listeners about the creation of the associated lobby with am UpdateLobbyCommand.
      Parameters:
      lobby - The lobby for which to create the controller.
      Returns:
      The created lobby controller.

    • destroyLobbyController

      public void destroyLobbyController(LobbyController controller)
      Destroys the given lobby controller associated with its managed lobby. It also removes all the players currently into the lobby. This method notifies all registered listeners about the deletion of the associated lobby with am UpdateLobbyCommand.
      Parameters:
      controller - The lobby controller to destroy.

    • addPlayerToLobby

      public void addPlayerToLobby(Player target, UUID lobbyUUID) throws FullLobbyException
      Adds a player to the specified lobby. This method notifies all registered listeners about the status change of the associated lobby with an UpdateLobbyCommand.
      Parameters:
      target - The player to be added to the lobby.
      lobbyUUID - The UUID of the lobby.
      Throws:
      FullLobbyException - if the lobby is full.

    • removePlayerFromLobby

      public void removePlayerFromLobby(Player target, Lobby lobby)
      Removes a player from the specified lobby. This method notifies all registered listeners about the status change of the associated lobby with an UpdateLobbyCommand.
      Parameters:
      target - The player to remove from the lobby.
      lobby - The lobby from which to remove the player.

    • getGameController

      public GameController getGameController(UUID gameUUID)
      Retrieves the game controller associated with the specified game UUID.
      Parameters:
      gameUUID - The UUID of the game.
      Returns:
      The game controller associated with the specified UUID, or null if not found.

    • createGameController

      public GameController createGameController(Game game)
      Creates a new game controller for the specified game.
      Parameters:
      game - The game for which to create the controller.
      Returns:
      The created game controller.

    • destroyGameController

      public void destroyGameController(GameController controller)
      Destroys the game controller associated with the specified game controller.
      Parameters:
      controller - The game controller to destroy.

    • addListener

      public void addListener(Listener listener)
      Adds a listener to the list of the ones registered to lobbies updates, both inside or outside one.

      This method ensures thread-safe addition of listeners to the list.

      Specified by:
      addListener in interface Listenable
      Parameters:
      listener - The listener to be added.

    • removeListener

      public void removeListener(Listener listener)
      Removes a listener from the list of the ones registered to lobbies updates, both inside or outside one.

      This method ensures thread-safe removal of listeners from the list.

      Specified by:
      removeListener in interface Listenable
      Parameters:
      listener - The listener to be removed.

    • notifyListeners

      public void notifyListeners(ClientCommand command)
      Notifies all registered listeners with the specified command.

      This method ensures thread-safe iteration over the listeners list while notifying them.

      Specified by:
      notifyListeners in interface Listenable
      Parameters:
      command - The command to be sent to all listeners.
